gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.jdbc
Class JdbcConnectionsTransactionManager

java.lang.Object
  gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.job.JobCapableTransactionManager
      gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.jdbc.JdbcConnectionsTransactionManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
TransactionManager
public class JdbcConnectionsTransactionManager
extends JobCapableTransactionManager
implements TransactionManager

This is an inadequate implementation of TransactionManager based on an SQL Connection. This is a temporary solution until a proper JTA implementation is in place.

Constructor Summary
JdbcConnectionsTransactionManager()
          Creates a new JdbcTransactionManager with an sql Connection.
